title: How to Draw a Native American Face

steps.headline: Draw a big oval line above the big oval.
Add two lines for the neck.
Draw two small circles and few lines as shown.
Close to the small circles add two small ovals for the eyes.
Now use the lead pencil to draw all the detail properly, and do some shading.
Take a black pencil and go over the drawing.

text: Draw a big oval.  Draw a big oval line above the big oval.  Add two lines for the neck.  Draw two oblong ovals.  Draw two small circles and few lines as shown.  Close to the small circles add two small ovals for the eyes.  Add more details.  Now use the lead pencil to draw all the detail properly, and do some shading.  Take a black pencil and go over the drawing.
sentences: Draw a big oval line above the big oval.
Add two lines for the neck.
Draw two small circles and few lines as shown.
Close to the small circles add two small ovals for the eyes.
Now use the lead pencil to draw all the detail properly, and do some shading.
Take a black pencil and go over the drawing.
